column1: I have used only Ponds cold cream to clean my face for 57 years. I tried the Rejuveness as soon as I saw it in store. I love it. Makes my skin feel soft and it lessens look of fine wrinkles I am beginning to have. I am 70 but people always take me for 50. I thank 57 years of using Ponds. Now I use your towelettes after the cold cream and the Rejuveness. That is all that goes on my face. It is all I need! Thank you for great products.

The Ponds Anti Wrinkle cream was pretty good.I liked tge fact that it didnt irritate around my eye area.It was very smooth, non greasy and had my skin looking great.I received complimentary , tthis is my unbiased review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm a member of Influenster. This product was sent to me for testing purposes and all opinions are my own. This is the first time that I tried Pond's Rejuveness. Not only did I like the smell but I noticed a difference the very first time I used it. I'm glad that I got a chance to try it cause I know I will be buying this. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I completed the 2 week challenge and loved the results. I used this morning and night and was able to see results within 2 weeks. I was skeptical at first but the results made me a believer. I was even able to reduce the "11" between my eyebrows. I obtained my product for free through Influenster and took the challenge. My own personal opinion is that this is a great product. Definitely will be buying it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I needed a change from my normal routine..in just art in a facial moisturizer regimen. I remember my aunt swear by PONDS product for years. Since I'm 39...woooweee!! been awhile since I admit my age since most people don't believe my age. One week In and I can feel the difference. Never to early to start taking care of your skin.

Love this product. I was hesitant to do the two-week challenge but decided to see what this product would do. Yes I really love this. Absorbs well when applied lightly. This smoothed my skin. I don't have any wrinkles, maybe fine lines under my eyes but even I wouldn't call it that. I noticed how evened out my skin was. Didn't look dull but fresh. This has a nice light scent. Texture is smooth and light. A nice light layer is good for me. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

ivd been using this for four months now and my fine lines are gone. i use this at night and let it soak in, then apply the dark correcting cream. my fine lines are not noticeable and my skin tone is even.

Love the way it makes your skin feel...my face is smoother...less noticeable wrinkles...decided to try on my hands...they look younger...wish they made a body lotion...not a bad look for 62 (me) and 65 (sister)

I bought this product hoping to look a few years younger. First time buyer last time buyer. Is it absolutely nothing I've been using it for a month two times a day. I was very disappointed in this product.
I use this product because my face look healthy. And feel very good using ponds. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
This is a wonderful product, leaves skins soft & smooth! & smells good too! Really helps those fine lines.

I have been using Rejuveness Anti-Wrinkle Cream for about a week now and I can see the difference already. I am a senior on a fixed income and I want to thank you for making such a great product at such an affordable price. I am attaching some photos of my Grandmother's old Ponds jar from 1910 that my Mother gave to me. Honestly I didn't know that Ponds was still in business until my niece told me.

I started using the Pond's Rejuveness moisturizer about two weeks ago and I can honestly say the results are impressive. I pull in my eyes a lot so they are starting to look wrinkly. After the first two weeks of use, I've noticed a fullness in that area or should I say it looks filled. This is something I will definitely buy again. This also has a pleasant scent unlike most drug store moisturizers. I got this free to try from Influenster and def recommend. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
getting over 50 I realize I need an anti wrinkle formula. Again I am satisfied with POND'S product.

If you have sensitive skin you might want to avoid this product. I wanted something for my dry skin after entering menopause and decided to try this as it was reasonably priced. Can't use it. My face is now tight, swollen, red and itchy. I everywhere it is red it also feel hot. Tried to wash it off but it absorbed right into my skin and I will just have to wait for my body to get rid of the toxin on its own.

I have taken the 2 week Rejuveness challenge and I'm impressed. The scent is amazing compared to some other anti-wrinkle creams I've used in the past. After the 2 week challenge I can see a faint difference in the forehead wrinkles and I will continue to use the product. I received this item complementary To use and review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

POND'S Rejuveness ANTI-AGING CREAM have an esplendid fragances, as baby powder. It is a light cream that absorbs quickly. It's not feel greasy or sricky. After several days, I noticed that my face looks brighter, younger and smoother. I do not have wrinkles and I think this cream will take a long time to leave. The use twice a day as part of daily beauty routine. Definitely, I will buy. I received this sample from Pinchme free for testing purposes but all opinion are my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received this product via Influenster and I loved the combo of this and theB3 dark spot remover. I used as directed & noticed how smootth& soft my skin became just after the second day. I love it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This smells. So much so that my husband made me go wash this cream off. The scent is so overwhelmingly grandma, I dont understand why they dont update this formula to either remove it or take it down a notch. For that reason, this gets a huge one star.

I am 62 and the signs of aging are show, especially in my neck. I have tried many products from over the counter to expensive creams. The only difference I noticed is soft "wrinkly" skin. I saw Ponds Rejuveness Anti-Wrinkle Cream and gave it a try, well to my amazement, this product worked BETTER than any other lotions is ever tried. It is a must try for anyone in need. LOVE IT.

ive started using this product recently and i just bought it because my usual moisturizer wasnt in stock. its a good moisturizer but it could definitely be more moisturizing. i dont think i would buy this specific one again but i know their blue one like this is very good.
I use this everyday. My face gets dry from time to time and this lotion does the job for me. It was recommended to me and I would recommend to another.

I didnt see anything difference to the skin but it feels really nice on the skin especially under the eyes. It didnt break me out and had a good formula. I would buy this again to see if it lives up to its claims.

Gave this to my mom. She loved the fact that it was nice and moisturizing. She even has backup. Don't think she sees a big difference on reducing wrinkles. But nice product overall. Would recommend to others too. Will buy again soon cause it runs out fast.

What a great moisturizer and anti-aging cream! It keeps me looking young and doesn't cause me to itch! It's thick, so it doesn't feel greasy. It has some of the same properties as La Mere and it's a fraction of the price! Don't wait, try this now and get the moisture and anti wrinkle cream you need!

Fantastic daily moisturizer. Isnt heavy or greasy feeling and is gentle around the eyes. I use this at night and before applying my makeup. If you want that dewy feel that some moisturizers give then this one may disappoint. Ive found that if I really want that feeling or if my face is feeling a little more dry than normal I have to use quite a bit to achieve it.
I do not use this for wrinkle purposes but instead for the lovely scent . This was a gift. See no difference but I use this simply to moisturize my face.
I love this cream. The texture is incredibile, leave your skin soft and relaxed. You use it before the bed and keep my face moisturizer all night long.

I do like this ponds cream but I do like the dry skin formula a lot better. This was my first time using this formula in the brand. I do like the packaging I do think it is nice. I would recommend this to others.
Okay for short term but does not pack the punch which I need. Does not have lasting effects. I added coconut oil and it was much better but this will get you through.

I read that this was a dupe for la mer and while Im not quite sure thats accurate this stuff is pretty good. Ive been putting it on at night and my skin feels soft and fresh in the morning. Need longer to see if it actually helps with aging

I love this moisturizer especially for the night time. Ive used this for the past 4 months and absolutely love it. It makes my skin look and feel great. Works miracles, I really recommend you look into purchasing this!

This product is a must have for me. I use it twice a day, once in the morning and again at night. I noticed after using it for about 2 weeks that it helped with my wrinkles, including on my neck area.

I purchased this on a chance that it would work. I was stunned. This is an amazing product at an amazing price. I'm 68 and recently lost 50 lbs. The skin on my face has been a bit saggy since. With the help of this product, I've put the facelift on hold. I hope Ponds never stops producing this line. It's fabulous!!

I have tried so many expensive brands of specialty facial creams on my very sensitive, over-50 skin, but Rejuveness did the trick. I have been using it exclusively for over 6 months and I will not switch. My skin keeps well hydrated, looks younger with fewer wrinkles, and the softness can't be beat. It has really helped to protect my skin during this very cold winter and all without blocking up my pores. Thank you, Unilever, for creating an effective and affordable facial skin care product!

I took the #seeforyourself 2 week challenge and the results are really noticeable! My skin is soft and well moisturized, decrease in fine lines and it didn't clog my pores or give me acne. It absorbs fully and doesn't feel like a film on your skin. I really like it! I tested the POND'S products for free, but all opinions are my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My aunt always told me about Ponds, I remember I was around 14 when she told me that she kept young by just using ponds moisturizer; she swore by it. When I turned 20, I started using ponds, guess what? I swear by it too! This stuff works! I highly recommended it, it's a great product and very affordable.

As with all Ponds products, this one fails miserably because of the heavy perfume scent, which not only does not appeal to many noses but also causes many people's skin to react poorly. Sure wish Ponds would make unscented products some day, but I doubt they ever will.

I needed a new moisturizer and remembered how creamy and mild Ponds was when my mom use to use it. I'm 44 and have noticed my skin thinning. I've been using this for 2 weeks now and have noticeably brighter, smoother and plumper skin. I have also been using on my neck and heels and have been amazed at what this product is doing! I have used every outrageously anti-aging product available and this has been the best I've tried! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product worked with my skin. I have very sensitive skin (The reason I use Pond's in the first place) I was reluctant to buy but the store I was in was out of traditional Pond's Moisturizer. I thought what the heck, I am so glad I bought this. I do have to wait the 25 minutes after cleansing before I put it on but I'm happy to do it.

I tried Rejuveness for the fine lines/"crows feet" I've developed around my eyes and also the frown lines across my forehead. The high concentration of lactic acid proved to be too strong for my skin, causing it to become red and irritated. Also, the scent seems a bit overpowering. However, rather than toss the trial size that I had purchased, I used it on my rough feet and it was GREAT for my heels.

I am a migraine sufferer, although I've been using ponds moisturizer all my life, I bought this because I trusted it to be the same very light smell which I'm used to. I just got it in the mail last night. I was so eager to use it. I put it on and the smell was overwhelming. Not only did I get a migraine right away but I couldn't sleep alright from the perfume smell. It's now morning and I still smell it. Will not be using it a second time. Waist of money for me.

I've been using this product for a couple of years and wouldn't be without it. Matter-of--fact, the women in my family do 'a favorite thing' every Christmas and this product was mine to give. And now they wouldn't be without it. It's non greasy and can easily be worn under your foundations.

I'm still in my early twenties, but I figured if I want to keep looking youthful I should start to prevent aging when I have the skin I want to keep. Much to my surprise I saw an honest difference within a week. Who knew, right? But the product works! And it's much more affordable than most things on the market. I will definitely keep buying this.

I have delicate dry skin but it has many fine wrinkles, as my mother's did. I was trying other expensive products and I didn't really see any improvement. On a whim I picked up the Ponds. I absolutely LOVE how this smells. It's only been a week so I can't say for sure that I have seen results but I will definitely continue using this. The scent of it is very invigorating to me and very feminine.

Unfortunately, I was unable to do the two week challenge because of the overpowering fragrance of this product. After applying and having the product on for less than an hour each time, I had to wash my face. The fragrance gave me a headache each time I used it. I tried several different times to use the product, but each time had the same result. Perhaps Ponds could make this product without adding such a strong fragrance. Would definitely try again with a fragrance free product.

Have used Ponds Dry Skin cream my entire life but, now as I age, I thought I should add an anti-wrinkle component to my cream. So, when I saw Rejuveness, I thought I had found the right product. The cream feels good on my skin but the scent is overwhelming! Not sure if I will continue to use this product as the fragrance is so strong. Will look for a product that is fragrance free. I am disappointed though, because I have always used Ponds products.

POND'S Rejuveness is not only affordable, but it's hypoallergenic, so it doesn't cause breakouts. It's an easy way to prevent the signs of aging, like fine lines, wrinkles, and dryness. It's easy to find in the stores because POND'S is a solid brand. Gentle enough to use both morning and night and affordable enough to actually use twice a day. I highly recommend Rejuveness. I'm a product review blogger and I received this product in exchange for my honest review. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I bought it today wanted a rich night cream that would work on wrinkles. I use one for the day that has Vitiman C in it to brighten. I put it on my face, hands and arms and they all looked terrific after putting it on. Fine lines were smoothed over and my skin felt soft. I will be buying this again after I use it all.

I purchased this for the super crepeness on the back of my hands. (Nothing ages a woman like her hands) I started using Rejuveness Anti-Wrinkle Cream Thursday, today is Sunday. There is a dramatic improvement. Why, oh why did I ever wander away from Pond's products. I have tried numerous really expensive lotions and creams - no improvement. I should have taken the hundreds of dollars I wasted and threw it into the street. Ponds developed a product that not only works, but is affordable.

POND'S Rejuveness Anti Wrinkle Cream is a must have moisturizer to start preventing wrinkles. Pond's is an OG brand that even my mother and grandmother recommend it! Packaging is nice and in a compact jar. POND'S Rejuveness Anti Wrinkle Cream is super inexpensive and absolutely buying again!

I bought this to try out because I have combination skin an I have bad smile lines the only good things I. Can. Say about this when I. Put it on it did make my wrinkles fade for. A. Little bit an it smells. Good. But for. Some. Reason it would. Crumble on my face leave white balls. I. Didn't. Like that at all it wasn't moisturizing on my skin. So I was disappointed

It seemed to help. And still does help. Just need a few othere products to go with it due to my skin type is different for places on my face. Every one is different when it comes to these things. I have nothing negative to say about this brand other than it works for me.

I love this! it helps keep away wrinkles and even acne. I love that it is inexpensive and that the second ingredient is lactic acid.... so your skin is getting what it needs to feel and look better. This cream doesn't make me feel oily and greasy, I still feel like my face can "breathe" and it's not stifled under a thick heavy cream. This cream absorbs rather quickly and isn't sitting on top of your skin.

It wasnt bad but it wasnt great either. It was very basic to me and I didny really enjoy it as much as the clarant B3 which is a holy grail of mine. Its still a great value regardless and I recommend if you want a good night moisturizer thats gentle and affordable.

POND'S Rejuveness Anti Wrinkle Cream Im a first time user. This Is a new addition to my skin care routine and Im LOVING it! I use it morning and night after cleansing my face. Its very gentle and has a light and clean fragrance. I have mature skin and want to reduce signs of aging and fine lines and wrinkles. I will continue using this product. Its really moisturizing and makes my makeup apply so much nicer.

Bought this at first to go on a trip and it was small to carry, but little did I know I loved it! It leaves my skin super moisturized without making it greasy and goes on so nicely! I dont have wrinkles yet, but definitely think it firms fine lines! This is my new favorite face lotion and it is not expensive either!

I absolutely love this cream! Its a must in my skincare routine. I apply it after washing my face and applying toner. Its very hydrating and really locks in to moist skin. It doesnt leave an oily residue. It has a mild scent which isnt unpleasant at all to me, but that may be something for those sensitive to scents to look out for. This is my staple face and neck moisturizer.

Although I dont have a lot of wrinkles yet I like to use this ponds anti wrinkle cream to help prevent any or slow the process for any. As soon as I put some of this cream on my face I instantly feel it working. I feel as if my face is being hugged. Its hard to explain but if you use it, you will definitely know the feeling I am talking about. It leaves my skin looking so soft and moisturized.

I like the formula and the consistency of this cream. I think the price is good. It says results visible in two weeks but I am not seeing major results, but I do see a minimal improvement in my skin. I think maybe after a bit longer it might be more results but not as I expected it to be.
Ive been using this facecream for years. It doesn't leave my face feeling greasy and it absorbs quickly.
I think this is good and is gentle but I prefer the rejuveness anti wrinkle on the red container... works way better
this moisturizer really hydrates your skin and if you use it daily you will definitely see hw wrinkles disappear
It would have a great moisturizer for me but the scent ruins it. It's too overwhelming. Even the smallest amount of this product carries a strong smell.

Its really thick and I seen a difference on my neck. I just dont like the scent it has it lingers for a while . I bought the trial size to test it out and will be purchasing the full size when I'm done with it .

This cream leaves you with good soft skin!!! I love using this cream because after my skin is just tight and glowing!!! My mom who is 55 years old loves it and got me into wearing it and now I cant stop!!!!!
Ponds is my go to lotion. Every single bottle color is different . I really recommend reading what it says it fits any skin type. It is a little thick so a little goes a long way.

I picked this up on a whim in a small travel size and have I been missing out! It is a little too rich for my combo skin for day use, especial over warm summer months, but I love it for evening use in my night time routine. Great price point too!

I've used this a few times it's pretty thick on the skin. The smell is soft so that's good. Doesn't actually do much for existing wrinkles but it may be preventing them from getting deeper. It's an ok in a pinch product.

amazing. everything Ponds I recommend. this cream I put on some times after the shower if my face is super dry. also I recommend using a little bit if this in a cutip to get your eye makeup off. it works wonders.
i LOVE this product SOOOOOOO Very much!!!! I use this product ALLLL the TIME! It NEVER has let me down!!! it does the job it is supposed to!!!!!
Here my photos of my every day looks and my ponds stacked up to keep my skincare on top and make sure to use day and night! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I bought this and absolutely love it! I have been using it for about 1 1/2 weeks and I can see the difference. I would recommend to anyone!! Thank you Ponds!!!!

I USED POND'S FACE CREAM FOR YEARS. I AM GLAD IT IS BACK. I AM USING BOTH OF THESE CREAMS AND I LOVE THEM. THEY MAKE MY FACE FEEL LIKEIT WAS BATHED IN WATER IT IS THAT HYDRATED. THANK YOU POND'S FOR COMING BACK.

I used once and Loved it the feel of it but not the smell. I do not understand why so many products add fragrance to their products. This smells like something my grandmother would wear. Would be a customer for life if it were fragrance free.
I am sorry to say that I cannot use this product because of the overwhelming smell. I therefore cannot say whether it is good for my skin or not. I love Ponds Cold Cream.

Purchased product on recommendation of a neighbor whose skin looks wonderful. I have issues with the strong perfume smell which gives me a headache. There is also a slight burning sensation after applying.
Great product but I wish they also made it fragrance free. I have sensitive skin, Ponds pls also make the exact same cream but fragrance free, otherwise can't Continue to use.

Ponds has been around forever and is just as wonderful now as years ago! I LOVE Clarant! It is wonderful and works great! Been using it for 1 week and really notice the difference in brown spots on each cheek. Thank you Ponds!

I have extremely sensitive and dry skin and this product works miracles on my skin. It leaves my face feeling baby soft, and soothed. Its become part of my skincare routine and I recommended it to everyone that I know!
I keep it at home and have a travel size one. I use it at night before going to bed and in the morning before leaving for work. This and the cold cream are my go tos.

This product is an amazing price. However for me I did not find it particularly moisturizing not did I find it to make any difference on wrinkles. The scent is light and the texture is creamy but it is not something I would purchase again.

Works great. Keeps my face moisturized, while protecting me from fine lines and wrinkles. You are never not old enough to worry about skincare. The earlier, the better. I would recommend to anyone to try!
My mom bought this, I tried it and it texture is creamy plus it smells good. I didn't keep on using, but til this day my mom uses it and I have seen that it does help.
This cream of ponds is wonderful in the night you apply it on the face and neck and it helps you to prevent wrinkles and spots clear up a lot is terrific it does not leave the sticky skin is great

I use this product every night. For the most part I love it but the only bad part is the smell. It just reminds me of my grandma. But other than the smell, I love how fresh my skin looks the next day!

Love it! It leaves my skin soft and smooth as well as helps with my dry skin. The container it comes in is super cute and easy to take along wherever you go. This is a great product that I will continue to buy and I highly recommend it to everyone.
I love this product. Its cheap and easy to find. Its absorbs so well into the skin and feels very hydrating! Im not sure if it helps with wrinkles but everyone guesses me as much younger than I am!
this product is great for dry skin, but if your skin is acne prone this is not your moisturizer as I tend to break out more often when using this formula
I would highly recommend this. I've noticed a big change in my skin since I started using it. Very gentle on the skin and more effective than anything else I've tried. It's also very affordable.

This is so moisturizing without being oily! My grandma swears by this stuff and was the only one she used, it keeps her skin looking 20 years younger and shes 89! I had to trust it and try it, now I love it.

wrinkles. Started using Pondd in my younger years. My grandmother used it . Every night after Washington g my face with noxema . I have no wrinkles. And I'm 51. My grandmother was 83 and never looked her age.

My mom has always used this brand for her makeup removal. As I got older, I started to as well. It goes on very smooth. And leaves skin very soft. The reason I couldnt give it 5 stars is because it does seem to leave a greasy feeling on my face. Maybe its just me. But I do Love the product

So far, I like this product. It has a nice smell, and a very thick consistency, so my face feels nice and moisturized. I am not sure if it is helping my wrinkles or not because I use several creams, but so far I like this product and would buy it again.

Hello. i love all product of this company if you allow me to review this product I would grateful to you. I can help you promote your product by reviewing them in my photo for the purpose of people to buy from internet and on encouraging the same time help the company promote good news. Best Regards

This product, in itself here is well known and quoted, is mostly used as a make-up remover, however it applied its function, which helped me to clear my skin, since it had sunburned and stained my skin, it helped me to recover and also maintain a thinner skin; I would add clean, soft, refreshing, without forgetting very well treated.

This product does work. It helps with wrinkles and hydrated the skin without feeling heavy or greasy. I find the scent of this product to be good but overwhelming, like the other products within this brand. I don't have issues with breakouts or anything when I use this and my skin can be sensitive. I like the price of this product and will buy again when on a tight budget.

This wrinkle cream is good for the price I can't say whether or not it helped with fine lines or wrinkles. It is very moisturizing but doesn't leave my face feeling greasy. It is very gentle even for me who has pretty sensitive skin. I would recommend this product.

Nice sent and consistency for a nightly moisturizing treatment. Did not meet the expectation I thought it would have. Really affordable for the quantity. I purchased the travel size wich is for 2 weeks. I would recommend it but not for the wrinkle treatment

I have used this moisturizer while traveling because it comes in cute little bottles. It worked really well and kept my face feeling hydrated, but not greasy. It was pretty cheap for the travel size and lasted a good amount of time. I didn't see any major change in fine lines or wrinkles, but I would purchase this again.

This product is very affordable and a little goes a long way. I got the trial size and I have had it for over two months now and I'm about half way done with it. It leaves my skin feeling nice and plump. I will be repurchasing this product when I run out.

Im only 26 so I don't have much wrinkles or lines to worry about but I do use this a few times every couple of weeks. It does give a moisturized feel and I notice the scent last a decent time through out the day. It's better to start with great skin care routine while young and not waiting for too long when it's too late. I would recommend it to anyone wanting to avoid or to help moisturize dry wrinkled skin

I ran out of my regular moisturizer and picked up a Pond's trial size! I am so glad that I did! This moisturizer has been a great find for my dry winter skin! Pond's was always my granny's "cure-all" cream for dry, itchy skin. We always laughed at her, but now I know she was right!

Best product!! I was considering a professional chemical peel for my forehead and neck. I am 45 with sun damage 2 deep wrinkles on my forehead and my neck has 2 deep wrinkles and is sagging. It took about a month but my deep wrinkles are lines now and my neck has tighten amazing.

I am really happy with this product. I have sensitive skin and this product doesn't make my face break out or leave it red and blotchy like some other products have before. The price point is excellent! I get a quality product without having to spend a fortune. I also have very dry skin and with Rejuveness my face feels soft all day. The only downside is that it doesn't have an SPF in the product. If that were combined, then this would be the ultimate face moisturizer! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Use this product and friends tell me I look 10 years younger and im 41. It nourishes and keeps face looking younger.
Nice results, very cost-effective , but not a huge fan of the scent. Wish it smelled better .I use it on my body, not my face.
Soft in your skin and easy to use. It doesn't clog my pores and has a soft baby skin after prodyct feels which is good for me.
One of my favorite face creams. The smell is so good. It's very inexpensive and keeps my face moisturized. I would recommend this cream.
This is my nightly routine cream. I use it every night. It keeps my skin moisture and prevent wrinkles. Texture is,really creamy. It just blends in.
My mom has used this for a while now and she is extremely satisfied with the product. It starts showing results in around two weeks.
I used this as a night cream for 6 weeks straight I am so impressed my face looks more lifted and brights
I love this product I been using this product since I was 10 years old I love the smell the way it makes my skin smooth
This is a great product for someone for sensitive skin like me. It's very mild and leaves your face soft and smooth without the oily feel.
It is an excellent product; moisturizes the skin and helps correct imperfections, is refreshing and smells delicious
It helps in forming the skin and visibly reduces the appearance of fine lines . It is dermatologically tested , hypoallergenic and won't clog pores .
Love this product.. a little goes a long way. Doesn't leave your skin oily. Keeps my face moisturized all day which is awesome.
Evidenced by combination skin out, but did Mitt notice any wrinkle reduction. I received this from someone. I don't know the cost. The packaging was simple.
This is good for people who are aging. You have to use this for 2mths to see result. But this said 2wks you should see a different. The texture is thick but smooth when you rub in.

I have very sensitive skin and this product is amazing. It also seems to have reactivated my Botox. My dermatologist asked if I had had Botox done from my last visit. After seeing my skin my co-workers have all started using it
Imagree with a lot of the other reviews. I have no idea what this product will do to remove wrinkles after only two days, but I cannot stand the odor!
This eye cream definitely plumps any sagging or wrinkles on the eyes. I don't use it religiously but when I feel like I need a pick me up, this cream gets the job done!
I have dry skin and I use this and it seriously feels so rich and moisturizing. I switched to this because my last moisturizer just wasn't working for me anymore & I seriously love this one!

I love how thick this product is, but at the same time how well it absorbs into the skin. A little goes a long way, so I love the small trial sized packagings. The smell is very light and pleasant. I have been using this product for several years.
so love this brand and this product so much! It's gentle on my skin, which is very sensitive. This product is also very affordable, which is great for college students like me!!
I love this cream. It really works and since it is such a large jar I can use as much as I want. I would recommend this to anyone. It works better than the $!00.00 cream I usually use.

I use this religiously and my face has never felt more soft. You put it on after washing your face and it leaves a tingly feeling. I'm almost out but I'll definitely be buying more. It's the only product that doesn't break me out.

I use this at night, not sure if it is helping with wrinkles but it has helped from the cold blistering air we've had. My face was drying out and it helped to bring back moisture to my face with out and oily residue
